item.title: Shorts Clipper for Niche Content with Captioning - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and detail-oriented Shorts Clipper to join our team (Must be able to read English and you're an English speaker). Your primary role will be to clip engaging short segments from our long-form content and add captions. This role requires minimal editing beyond cutting, but a keen eye for compelling content and accuracy in captioning is essential.

Responsibilities:
- Watch long-form videos and identify engaging segments suitable for short-form content.
- Clip selected segments and ensure seamless transitions.
- Add accurate and engaging captions to each clip.
- Maintain the original tone and message of the content.
- Be willing to learn and understand the niche of the content to ensure relevancy and appeal.
- Collaborate with our content team to ensure alignment with overall content strategy.

Requirements:
- Proficiency in English (both written and spoken).
- Basic video editing skills with experience in clipping and adding captions.
- Ability to understand and engage with the niche of the content.
- Detail-oriented with a strong sense of timing and pacing.
- Reliable and able to meet deadlines.
- Familiarity with social media platforms and trends is a plus.

Preferred Tools:
- Adobe Premiere Pro
- Final Cut Pro
- CapCut or similar video editing software

Additional Information:
- This is a remote position with flexible hours.
- You will be working closely with our content team and will receive regular feedback and guidance.
- There is potential for long-term collaboration and additional projects for the right candidate.

If you are passionate about creating engaging short-form content and have an eye for detail, we would love to hear from you. Please provide examples of your previous work, particularly short clips with captions, when applying.

How to Apply:
- Submit your resume and a brief cover letter explaining why you are a good fit for this role.
- Include links to your portfolio or samples of relevant work.
- Mention your familiarity with the tools listed and your availability.


Posted On: June 24, 2024 15:03 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Production, English
Skills: Video Editing, Video Production, English
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Looking For Video Editor For YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a video editor to join my team to help create videos like this: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2POuCPits4s

I will be making 3 videos per week on various topics covering SpongeBob, Family Guy, The Simpsons, etc.

I am looking for a strong editor who has experience with retention based editing for YouTube videos. I need someone who can use memes and humour to make a video engaging for a young audience. Please see the video above for an example.

My videos will be a minimum of 8 minutes in length, up to 30 minutes long. My budget is 10$/minute of edited video. You will be provided the footage, script, and narration.

Please apply with your price per minute and relevant examples of past work. Thanks!

Budget: $80

Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe After Effects

item.title: Video Editor for Short Videos - Upwork
item.description:
I am looking for a full-time video editor to create short videos for me. Please give me your per-short rate. Each video should be 59 seconds. You will be paid for 59 seconds editing even if the Short is 40 seconds.

Also, I want someone with this attitude:

1. Kabhi Videos Edit Karni hogi.
2. Kabhi Editing ke liye khud ideas dena hoga ta ke videos edit karun.


Matlab, I will create as much content as I can shoot so you can edit. However, based on my genre, you should also suggest videos and start working on them. Jitne ziada videos, itni ziada aapki income.


To get started, just send me two things. PLEASE DO NOT SEND ME LONG RESPONSE. Seedhi baat no bakwas!

1. Portfolio
2. Rate per Short

Clear hai?


Here are a few samples:
https://www.facebook.com/reel/2677031055794955
https://www.facebook.com/reel/446397701271930


Budget: $25

Category: Video Editing

item.title: Video Editing for YouTube & TikTok - Upwork
item.description:
We are open as far how pricing would best be. Either hourly for this work, or price per video, or a fixed price per week.

We are looking for someone that can take video links we send you, then have the videos re worked / edited so they don't get flagged as duplicate copied content.

We would be sending you a video link we find on instagram/youtube or anywhere else. Then you take that video, edit it, add text across it and preferably have orange coloring in the text. You can use chatgpt or something like that to re do the script/wording and if you have some program that can create a voice over file over the video from there too.

We would like to be able to send a link like this one: https://www.instagram.com/reel/C72qCOsMd-v/?igsh=MzRlODBiNWFlZA==

And have it re created, like the video put together so it's different from that one and we can post it on YouTube & Tiktok.We would like the format of the video to be like this one here: https://www.instagram.com/reel/C8dIY_APmW4/?igsh=MzRlODBiNWFlZA%3D%3D

So it would be:
-Re making the video with the text running on the video like that one. But with Orange color that pops out instead of multi colored like that one has
-A voice over the video like that one has. It looks like it uses some sort of program for a voice over where you just put enter the script you want to use and it creates a voice over file
-So it's pulling the words/script of the Instagram video we sent and then putting that through chat gpt to create a different voice over so it's not copied content and doesn't get flagged as copied content.

If this is something you can do, could you please use that link above, this one: https://www.instagram.com/reel/C72qCOsMd-v/?igsh=MzRlODBiNWFlZA==

This could actually end up being a long term project and consistent work if we can get this down.

If you want to use the examples above to re make the video and send it to me to show you can do this, that would be great. Let me know if you have any questions.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 14:59 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, YouTube Development
Skills: Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production, Adobe Premiere Pro, YouTube Development
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video and Audio Editor with Descript Expertise - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and experienced Video and Audio Editor who is an expert in using Descript. Descript expertise is non negotiable and fast turnaround is required. As an Editor, you will be responsible for editing and enhancing video and audio content for various projects. Your primary task will be to utilize Descript's advanced features to achieve high-quality results. The ideal candidate should have a strong understanding of video and audio editing principles, excellent attention to detail, and the ability to meet strict deadlines.

  Responsibilities:
  - Edit and enhance video and audio content using Descript
  - Ensure seamless transitions, audio synchronization, and visual effects

  Skills:
  - Expertise in using Descript for video and audio editing
  - Attention to detail and ability to meet short deadlines
- Fluent English

Starting on a project basis but looking for a long term hire.

item.title: Social Media Manager - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled Social Media Manager to oversee our brand's online presence and engage with our target audience.

The ideal candidate will have:
1. Deep understanding of various social media platforms including LinkedIn, Twitter, Instagram, TikTok and their features
2. Proven track record of implementing successful social media strategies.

Responsibilities include:
1. Creating and curating engaging content
2. Managing social media accounts, monitoring analytics, and interacting with followers
3. Proficiency in video editing, creating thumbnails, etc.
4. Weekly Monday Zoom meeting to discuss the week and review posts
5. Create a weekly plan and as we get up to speed, create a monthly and quarterly plan

The successful candidate must be creative, detail-oriented, and have excellent communication skills.
        Required skills:
        - Proficient in social media management tools
        - Strong knowledge of social media analytics
        - Excellent copywriting and editing skills
        - Familiarity with graphic design principles
        - Ability to create visually appealing content
        - Experience in managing social media accounts for businesses
-Video editing and creation of thumbnails 
-Use of Dropbox for obtaining images, videos to edit, etc.

*** Include your portfolio with your resume ***


Hourly Range: $8.00-$25.00
Posted On: June 24, 2024 14:51 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:LinkedIn, TikTok, Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Instagram, Social Media Content Creation
Skills: LinkedIn, TikTok, Social Media Management, Social Media Marketing, Facebook, Instagram, Social Media Content Creation
Country: USA
click to apply

I have a YouTube channel and I'm seeking a talented individual to create engaging short Roblox content. Ideal candidates should have a degree in cinema or a related field.

- Produce high-quality video content.

item.title: VSL Creation (German needed) - Upwork
item.description:
Wir suchen einen erfahrenen deutschen Video-Cutter, der uns bei der Erstellung eines 2-minütigen Video Sales Letters (VSL) unterstützt. Das Projekt umfasst das Erstellen von Videos basierend auf einem Skript, einschließlich der Integration von Stock Footage, Animationen und Untertiteln.

Anforderungen:
- Erfahrung im Schneiden von Marketing-Videos, vorzugsweise VSLs
- Vertrautheit mit deutschen Untertiteln und Texten
- Fähigkeiten im Hinzufügen von Animationen und Stock Footage
- Zuverlässigkeit und Einhaltung von Deadlines
- Fließend in Deutsch

Aufgaben:
- Bearbeiten und Schneiden von Videomaterial basierend auf einem bereitgestellten Skript
- Einfügen von relevanten Stock Footage und Animationen
- Hinzufügen von deutschen Untertiteln
- Zusammenarbeit mit unserem Team, um sicherzustellen, dass das Video unseren Anforderungen entspricht



Budget: $150

Category: Video Editing
Skills:Audio Editing, Video Sales Letter, Video Editing, German, Marketing Advertising

The first shoot is this Wednesday (6/25) 10a-12p - please let me know if you can be available for this time.

Necessary Skills:
- Videography
- Lighting
- Audio

We have the seperate audio file for the voice over.

So it would be a case of converting this voice over to the new voice.

We would expect an audio file deliverable that we can add to the video ourselves.

item.title: Digital Marketing Specialist - Upwork
item.description:
Remote work possible

We are a growing video production company seeking a dynamic and innovative Digital Marketing Specialist to enhance our digital presence and drive our marketing strategies.

Job Description:
We are looking for a Digital Marketing Specialist with a strong interest in artificial intelligence to manage our outward-facing look and ensure our brand remains at the forefront of industry trends. This role will involve managing our social media platforms, creating and scheduling posts, engaging with our audience, and producing high-quality visual content.

Key Responsibilities:
Manage and grow our presence on social media platforms (LinkedIn, YouTube, Instagram, TikTok, etc.).
Create, schedule, and publish engaging content that aligns with our brand voice and strategy.
Edit videos and create graphics using Photoshop and other design tools.
Track and analyze social media metrics and website traffic to inform strategies.
Optimize content for SEO to improve visibility.
Engage with our online community, respond to comments, and foster a positive brand image.
Stay updated on the latest AI trends and implement relevant strategies to help scale the company.

Requirements:
Proven experience in digital marketing and social media management.
Proficiency in video editing and graphic design software (e.g., Adobe Premiere, Photoshop).
Strong understanding of SEO and web traffic metrics.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Ability to analyze data and derive actionable insights.
Strong interest in artificial intelligence and its applications in marketing.
Creative mindset with the ability to develop engaging content.

How to Apply:
Please send your resume, portfolio, and a cover letter explaining why you are the perfect fit for this role.

The job is $100/month.  Please respond "I UNDERSTAND" at the top of your response for this job. This will let me know you read this description completely.

Budget: $500
Posted On: June 24, 2024 14:22 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:LinkedIn, Facebook, YouTube, Social Media Marketing, Internet Marketing, Marketing Strategy, Instagram, LinkedIn Marketing
Skills: LinkedIn, Facebook, YouTube, Social Media Marketing, Internet Marketing, Marketing Strategy, Instagram, LinkedIn Marketing
Country: United States
click to apply
